You already know what im gonna say, beautiful game, story and everything else that this game has.
You probably shouldn't play it expecting an absolute god-tier-masterpiece, but it's a good game with a nice story. If you grew up with/around source games it'll give you really weird deja vu.

first game was pretty good, the sequel fulfills everything a good sequel should and leaves you wanting more, including the two episodes that follow up the main game. it doesn't tie it all up well enough for me to feel satisfied with the ending personally, so i decided to buy the sequel to that game half-life "Alyx".
it proceeded to call me broke fluently in 25 different languages.
regardless of if i own a VR a headset or not, I'm glad i was recommended this game. i hope this up and coming indie game company valve continues to make games.

A very overrated game but that doesn't mean its bad, its actually very good. All of the technical problems from the first three Half-Life games are not present in this one, no stuttering or freezing at all. A review of this game would have to be paragraphs long to go through all of the things it does better than any game before it and arguably after it but it would also take a long time to go into detail about everything that prevents this game from the "perfect game" a lot of people say it is. Very good game, I definitely recommend it, a deeply flawed masterpiece.

Pure classic, I played it back in 2005 and was blown away. Game is full of polished details, gameplay style is differential, immersion high, story engaging. It's one of THOSE games you love with all you heart and can replay for years without boredom. 

As if that was not enough, amount of user created content is huge - there is always something new to do.

One of the greatest FPS games of all time. An absolute classic.

I'm not sure I have enough words to describe this game. For a game that came out in 2004, almost 18 years ago, this game holds up very well. I felt honestly it's better than a lot of newer games. Level design is fantastic. Lots of different environments to play and explore. Story is really good and kept me engaged the whole time through. I was not expecting this game to be so good. It looks great, and is memorable as well.

Great game if you have gmod then it will give you some textures.

Personally, I think this game is overrated. The age of the game is really starting to show. I'm sure that this was a ground breaking game back when it came out, but now it's just clunky and rough. I was never able to get immersed into the world because I was constantly getting wedged on things and dealing with jank physics in general. The story I thought was kind of meh (I am missing things because I haven't played the first Half Life). The combat was annoying and the AI was basic at best. It always seemed like my squad was in the way of everything I was trying to do. WHY DO THEY JUST WALK BACKWARDS INSTEAD OF ACTUALLY GETTING OUT OF THE WAY!?
fun and hard some parts are hard 15 hours of fun and puzzle

Half-Life 2 - the second part of the Half-Life universe. Half-Life 2 at the time of its release became the game of the year due to its pluses. Although Half-Life 2 is based on the Half-Life engine, the redesigned Source engine features beautiful graphics, an interactive UI, improved AI logic, and more. Valve, thank you for playing! In the meantime, we'll wait for Barney to buy us a beer...
